de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.eval

Class Evaluation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.eval.EvaluationAPI
      • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.eval.Evaluation

  • public class Evaluation
extends EvaluationAPI
    Determines the differences between transliterations and/or cuneiform texts and weights them in various measurement methods. User: Timo Homburg Date: 25.10.13 Time: 18:20

      • pkEvaluation

        public java.lang.String pkEvaluation(java.lang.Boolean append,
                            ClassificationMethod classmethod)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: EvaluationAPI
        The Pk Evaluation moves through the original file and the generated file using a window of length k. k is defined as half of the mean manual segmentation length. Penalties are thrown if the windows edges are differing or the segmentations disagree
        Specified by:
        pkEvaluation in class EvaluationAPI
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error

      • pkEvaluation

        comparearray - the comparison array

      • segmentationEvaluation

        public java.lang.String segmentationEvaluation(java.lang.Boolean append,
                                      ClassificationMethod classmethod)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: EvaluationAPI
        Compares the given result with the original segmentation. Finds out matches among them and produces statistics. A match is a match if the amount of syllables and the word boundares are correct
        Specified by:
        segmentationEvaluation in class EvaluationAPI
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error
